title: Facebook UI Clone
shortDescription: A modern Facebook UI clone built with React and Tailwind CSS.
fullDescription: This project is a detailed clone of the Facebook user interface, created using React for component-driven development and Tailwind CSS for rapid, utility-first styling. It replicates Facebook's layout, navigation, and interactive elements, including a responsive design that works across devices. The project demonstrates advanced React patterns, state management, and UI/UX best practices. It's ideal for learning how to structure large-scale frontend applications and implement real-world design systems.
